articles.title: American MMA fighter Anthony 'Rumble' Johnson dies at 38 from undisclosed illness - CNN
articles.description: American MMA lightweight fighter Anthony 'Rumble' Johnson has died at the age of 38 from an undisclosed illness, according to Bellator MMA.
articles.content:
American MMA lightweight fighter Anthony Rumble Johnson has died at the age of 38 from an undisclosed illness, according to Bellator MMA.
